short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change colors of web pages by using filters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can apply 3 types of filters :
  - Filter stack among brightness, contrast, saturate, hue-rotate, invert and sepia.
  - Set Red, Green, Blue color channels.
  - Monochrome or monochrome+normal intermediate color.
Can simulate dark mode page by applying invert color for background+text and normal color for images.
Can use dynamic icon on toolbar to quickly view filter state of the current tab page.
Save settings globally or by domain.
Dark/light + old/modern + font size and more theme for extension UI.
